mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ar.admin_id FROM sys_role_resource rr LEFT JOIN sys_admin_role ar ON rr.role_id = ar.role_id WHERE rr.resource_id=#{resourceId}

SELECT ur.id id, ur.create_time createTime, ur.`name` `name`, ur.url url, ur.description description FROM sys_admin_role ar LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource rrr ON r.id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_resource ur ON ur.id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND ur.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.id
